text:
Use of resources for the year ending with 31st March 2006
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31st March 2006is authorised to the amount of £3,183,848,000.
Issue of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31st March 2006
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31st March 2006 the sum of£4,677,710,000.
Use of resources for the year ending with 31st March 2007
	The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31st March 2007is authorised to the amount of £171,791,003,000.
Issue of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31st March 2007
	The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom andapply to the service of the year ending with 31st March 2007 the sum of£161,256,893,000.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund Act 2005.
